misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the pride of Vuosaari Golf Helsinki, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. As Pasi's little brother, he has always had big shoes to fill, yet Eero has carved out his own distinct path in the world of golf.

With seven past appearances in the Hector Trophée, Eero is a familiar face at the event. He has one Victor Trophy to his name. While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Eero's dedication to the sport is undeniable.

In recent times, Eero has been focusing on strengthening his mental fortitude, complementing his already impressive technical skills. This holistic approach signals his intent to tackle future tournaments with renewed vigor. The upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 marks Eero's eighth appearance, and anticipation is high to see how his evolved mindset translates onto the course.
